main event: A civilian reported observing a brilliant object in the sky on 12 September 1965, which was brighter than the brightest planet and larger than a meteor.
interesting points: The object appeared to drop and moved towards the horizon, becoming smaller in size., The object took on the appearance of an airplane but moved more rapidly., It was described as having a bright white color that seemed to oscillate., The witness estimated the speed of the object to be about 1,500 mph., The witness had 4 years of experience as a pilot and was a practicing attorney.
sighted object: a brilliant object in the sky
witness description: a civilian with 4 years as a force pilot and a practicing attorney
